actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary, S. Rept. 94-1132.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 3690) entitled "A bill for the relief of R. Dean Dawes and others" to the Chief Commission of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 3690, entitled "A bill for the relief of R. Dean Dawes and others," to the Chief Commission of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 3690) entitled "A bill for the relief of R. Dean Dawes and others" to the Chief Commission of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.
